snippet: Rescue workers pulled eight survivors from the mud a day after a huge landslide hit the village of Malin in the Pune district of Maharashtra State in western India.
abstract: Rescue workers pull eight survivors from the mud one day after huge landslide hit the village of Malin in Maharashtra State in western India; also recover bodies of 31 people.
lead_paragraph: Rescue workers pulled eight survivors from the mud a day after a huge landslide hit the village of Malin in the Pune district of Maharashtra State in western India.

headline.main: India: Dozens of Villagers Still Missing After Landslide
headline.print_headline: India: Dozens of Villagers Still Missing After Landslide
